original_title: The Moment: How Sports Changed the World
overview: The story of Nelson Mandela and the South African Rugby team uniting to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup. This monumental moment in sports history paved the way for Siya Kolisi to become the first black South African rugby captain, and left an enduring impact in South Africa â€“ and the world.
title: The Moment: How Sports Changed the World
